name: PowerShell
description: Adversaries may abuse PowerShell commands and scripts for execution.

name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
description: Adversaries may abuse command-line interfaces to execute arbitrary commands.

name: Application Layer Protocol
description: Adversaries may use application layer protocols to communicate with C2 servers.

name: Phishing
description: Adversaries may use phishing to gain access to victim systems.

name: Brute Force
description: Adversaries may attempt to gain access through brute force password attacks.

name: Valid Accounts
description: Adversaries may leverage valid accounts to maintain access.
